intro.headline: An employee benefit that beats pain and stress
intro.description: @Work massage for employees drives physical and mental health for on-site, remote, and hybrid teams.

services.1: Choose chair massage, table massage, or a hybrid for on-site or remote employees.
services.2: Insured, credentialed practitioners from the Provider Network travel to the site.
services.3: Enjoy convenient online scheduling, plus convenient SMS reminders for employees.
services.4: Volume pricing lets you deepen your enterprise discount with more frequent sessions.

buildABetterOffice.title: Build a Better Office Experience
buildABetterOffice.body:
@Work makes it easy to create an office culture employees appreciate. Just 15 minutes of chair massage has been proven to reduce stress while also easing chronic pain and improving well-being.

How does it work?
Choose a weekly, monthly, or quarterly schedule to suit your team’s needs.Select 12, 15, or 20 minute sessions, for a total event duration based on participant number.
Designate a conference room or other quiet space for employees to peacefully enjoy sessions they book themselves.
buildABetterOffice.footer: Plan a wellness program with a specialist

workplacewellness.notReady: Not ready for an enterprise program? Try a one-time event! Join hundreds of organizations treating their teams to relaxing chair massage using our easy, self-serve platform.

enterpriseClient.title: Dedicated Support for Your Enterprise Needs
enterpriseClient.body:
As an enterprise @Work client, creating an exceptional wellness experience for your team is our goal. In addition to your access to  nationwide network of experienced massage therapists, your account includes:
Chair massage + table massage in any combination you choose A dedicated account manager
Online, self-serve scheduling and reminders for employees Volume discounts for more frequent, recurring sessions Utilization monitoring, reporting, and support
enterpriseClient.footer: Plan a wellness program with a specialist

results.headline: What Can Massage Do?
results.note: Real results for patients treated with medically prescribed massage.*

contactForm.headline: Design Your Corporate Wellness Program
contactForm.description: @Work makes it easy to build a culture of wellness at work. We work with HR leaders, office managers, and benefits brokers on programs that accelerate business and retain talent.

testimonial.description: Your Trust is Partnering with has made implementing a wellness program at Hawke simple! Our employees appreciate the program and continually express their excitement about the chair massages.
testimonial.author: - MELISSA B. HAWKE MEDIA

chairMassageEvent.title: We'll Bring the Well-Being to You
chairMassageEvent.description:
we brings rejuvenating chair massage to your workplace or event, provided by fully equipped, licensed, insured, and vetted massage therapists—at your designated location, on your schedule.

How does we chair massage work?
Design Your Event: Choose from a variety of options, including the number of attendees or massage therapists, duration, therapist gender, and location. Review your final quote and book online instantly.
Set Aside Space: Designate an area like a conference room or other space with low foot traffic. A 6' x 6' area is recommended per chair to allow the therapist adequate space to perform treatments. Your providers will bring all of the necessary equipment.Relax: Enjoy the relaxing, mood-boosting benefits massage adds to any workplace or event. No special preparation or clothing removal is necessary.

planningEvent.title: What's the Perfect Event Size for Your Group?
planningEvent.description:
You can choose between 12-minute, 15-minute, or 20-minute sessions for your chair massage event. This will determine how many massages can be provided depending on your total event duration and number of participants.

Each therapist can treat 3-5 people per hour, depending on session length:
12 minutes (10 mins hands on) = 5 people per hour
15 minutes (13 mins hands on) = 4 people per hour
20 minutes (18 mins hands on) = 3 people per hour

TIP: Events of 3 hours or longer are booked faster and are preferred by therapists. Your participants will appreciate longer sessions as well!

easyManagement.title: Easy On-call Management
easyManagement.firstDescription: Let us simplify your on-call therapist management so that you can focus on what's important— running your spa.
easyManagement.secondDescription: Getting great therapists when you need them is easy and simple with @Work.

form.title: Tell us a little about you.
form.description: Provide us with a bit more info about you and your spa, and a member of our team will be in touch with you soon.
form.confirmation: By selecting 'Submit', I confirm that I have read and agreed to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

introduction.first: At , our top priority has always been to make access to vital health and wellness services as seamless and safe as possible.
introduction.second: Our dedicated team of Trust & Safety professionals is constantly monitoring and updating the health and safety guidelines we share with the thousands of providers on the network. These guidelines are in line with federal, state and local directives surrounding the delivery of health and wellness services.
introduction.third: Clients may share special hygiene requests prior to the provider arriving for the appointment.

cleanlinessPractices.title: Cleanliness Practices
cleanlinessPractices.description:
Providers follow CDC guidelines on handwashing or using hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol content. Providers adhere to industry best practices which includes disinfecting equipment between clients and patients.

Clients and patients should never book an in-home treatment if they or a household member have symptoms of illness.

forConsumers.introduction: Mrs Lara has proudly delivered millions of health and wellness appointments to homes and corporate offices across more than 100 metro areas in the U.S.

vettedProviders.title: Vetted Providers
vettedProviders.description:
Our network of more than 11,000 providers includes massage therapists, physical therapists, nurses, and other healthcare practitioners.

Each provider on the  network is insured and thoroughly evaluated. In addition, each passes an ID-verification process and undergoes a mandatory criminal background check with continuous monitoring.

bookingAndReview.title: Provider Booking and Reviews
bookingAndReview.description:
After booking an appointment through , patients and clients receive a confirmation with their provider's name, photo, a short bio, credentials, and massage license number (for massage bookings).

We strongly encourage clients and patients to make us aware of any issues or concerns about their appointment or provider. Contact our Support team either by email at help@.com or through the  app or website. Serious issues will be escalated to our Trust & Safety team.

forProviders.introduction: Mrs Lara has proudly delivered millions of health and wellness appointments to homes and corporate offices across more than 100 metro areas in the U.S.

verifiedClient.title: Verified Clients
verifiedClient.description: All  clients and patients are verified, but  does not conduct background checks on its clients/patients.

safetyAndSupport.title: Safety and Support
safetyAndSupport.description:
Providers in the  network can decline any appointment based on a Trust and Safety issue at any time, including once an appointment has started. Our Support and Trust and Safety teams are available when a provider in the  network is at a home, hotel, or workplace for an appointment.

Providers are strongly encouraged to communicate with  if they have any concerns about a client or work environment upon arrival. Once an appointment is completed, providers are asked to rate the client and the interaction. In addition, if a provider’s concern rises to the level of safety, the provider is strongly encouraged to report the client to our Trust & Safety team immediately by contacting Support by email to help@mrslara.com or by messaging within the  Provider app.

clientCare.title: Client Care
clientCare.description: We strongly encourage our clients to report issues or concerns about their appointment or provider. Clients can contact the Support team by email at help@com or through the  app. Serious matters are escalated to the Trust & Safety team.

vettedProviders.title: Vetted Providers
vettedProviders.description:
Our network of thousands of providers includes massage therapists, physical therapists, nurses, and other healthcare practitioners.

Each provider on the  network is insured and thoroughly evaluated. In addition, each passes an ID-verification process and undergoes a mandatory criminal background check with continuous monitoring.

trustAndSafetyTeam.first_text: Our Trust & Safety team is an expert group of professionals, including law enforcement officials, former investigative journalists, and legal counsel focused on utilizing best-in-class security practices and software tools to address all matters of trust and safety.
trustAndSafetyTeam.second_text: Trust & Safety is available any time an appointment is taking place. The team can be reached by contacting Support via email at  help@zeel.com or via chat at .com/help.
